column4: hello... I have a clean install of ubuntu 10.04.  everything installed ok, but the generic SVGA driver was a little glitchy w/ my 64MB ATI agp 9200 card.  so, I upgrade via pkg manager to the incld. ATI drivers.  Big improvement.  But, now my fav screensaver glMATRIX doesn't work?  Am I missing some 3D lib?  What do I need to configure?  TIA.
i know, i use that one too :P
